message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_STATUS
message.locale: Decisions can only be maintained for active appeals.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_HEARINGSTATUS
message.locale: A decision cannot be entered as the final hearing has not been held on this appeal case.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_MULTIPLETHIRDPARTIES
message.locale: An appeal must not have multiple third parties associated with it.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_MULTIPLEAPPELLANTS
message.locale: An appeal must not have multiple appellants associated with it.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_DECISIONSTATUS
message.locale: Decisions can only be submitted for a case that is in progress.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_DECISIONCASESTATUS
message.locale: Decisions can only be approved for a case that is in progress.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_CASESTATUS
message.locale: Decisions can only be submitted for active cases.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_REJECT
message.locale: The decision must be submitted before it may be rejected.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_APPROVE_WITHOUT_SUBMIT
message.locale: The decision must be submitted before it may be approved.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DECISIONDOCUMENTMISSING
message.locale: File location and reference number must be specified.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_DECISIONSTATUSMISSING
message.locale: Decision status must be specified.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_DECISIONRESOLUTIONCODEMISSING
message.locale: Decision resolution must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DECISIONSTATUSSUBMITTED
message.locale: Decisions may not be modified when submitted.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_FV_DECISIONSTATUSAPPROVED
message.locale: Decisions may not be modified when approved.

message.name: INF_DECISION_TICKET_SUBJECT
message.locale: A submitted decision was created.

message.name: INF_DECISION_ATTACHMENTDESCRIPTION
message.locale: Hearing Decision.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_ALREADYEXISTS
message.locale: A decision has already been created for this case.

message.name: INF_DECISION_SUBMITTEDDECISIONCREATED
message.locale: Create submitted decision

message.name: INF_DECISION_CREATETASKFOROWNER
message.locale: Implement Appeal Decision.

message.name: INF_DECISION_NOTIFYAPPELLANT
message.locale: Notify Appellant of Hearing Decision.

message.name: INF_DECISION_NOTIFYREPRESENTATIVE
message.locale: Notify Representative of Hearing Decision.

message.name: INF_DECISION_NOTIFYTHIRDPARTY
message.locale: Notify Third Party of Hearing Decision.

message.name: INF_DECISION_NOTIFYRESPONDENT
message.locale: Notify Respondent of Hearing Decision.

message.name: INF_DECISION_NOTIFYOWNER
message.locale: Notify Case Owner of Hearing Decision.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_DECISIONDATEEMPTY
message.locale: A decision date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_VALIDDECISIONDATE
message.locale: The decision date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_DECISIONDATEEARLY
message.locale: The decision date cannot be earlier than the hearing date.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_NO_SUBMIT_RIGHTS_HEARING_CASE
message.locale: Only a hearing official may submit this decision for approval.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_NO_SUBMIT_RIGHTS_HEARING_REVIEW
message.locale: Only a hearing reviewer may submit this decision for approval.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_NO_APPROVAL_RIGHTS
message.locale: Only a supervisor may approve this decision.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_NO_REJECTION_RIGHTS
message.locale: Only a supervisor may reject this decision.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_NO_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE
message.locale: No active organization structure exists for this organization.
No active organisation structure exists for this organisation.

message.name: INF_IMPLEMENTATION_DEADLINE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Implement appeal case decision.

message.name: INF_IMPLEMENTATION_DEADLINE_REASON
message.locale: The appeal case decision must be implemented for this case.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_XFV_REJECT_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: Can only reject appeal decisions for active appeal cases.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_XFV_APPROVAL_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: The appeal decision has already been approved.
